Jacob Gunnell’s parents launch fundraiser after son’s LSD-related death https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jacob-gunnells-parents-launch-fundraiser-after-sons-lsd-lated-death/7PWOJLNFJZBKRHOD25OU7IZGHI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jacob-gunnells-parents-launch-fundraiser-after-sons-lsd-lated-death/7PWOJLNFJZBKRHOD25OU7IZGHI/ Cherie HowieParents say they'll "do anything to bring awareness" about safe drug taking. Fri, 15 Dec 2023 02:14:01 +0000 Hyme Gunnell (left) and Shelley O'Dwyer with their son Jacob Gunnell. The couple are fundraising for drug-checking after Jacob died when he jumped from an overpass while under the influence of LSD.

Engineered stone: Will NZ follow Australia to prevent silicosis lung disease? Workplace Safety Minister Brooke van Velden seeking advice https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/engineered-stone-will-nz-follow-australia-to-prevent-silicosis-lung-disease-workplace-safety-minister-brooke-van-velden-seeking-建议/AMMN2ZI2IFD2BLYZPXNX5ZFQNM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/engineered-stone-will-nz-follow-australia-to-prevent-silicosis-lung-disease-workplace-safety-minister-brooke-van-velden-seeking-建议/AMMN2ZI2IFD2BLYZPXNX5ZFQNM/ Nicholas JonesOne lung expert says silica dust from engineered stone 'is our new version of asbestos'.
